articles.title: Kim Jong Il meets with Korean in Russia
Kim Il Chol meets Russian military delegation
articles.content:
Kim Il Chol meets Russian military delegation 
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Vice marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the far eastern military district of the Russian Federal Armed Forces led by col. gen. Yuri Yakubov, commander of the district, yesterday.
 Present there were general Pak Jae Gyong, other generals and officers of the KPA, Russian ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov and military attache Vladislav Prokopenko.    
 Kim Il Chol also met and conversed with the leading officials and artistes of the ensemble of the red flag far Eastern Military District of the Russian Federal Armed Forces.

Talks held between parliamentary delegations of Korea and Tajikistan
articles.content:
Talks held between parliamentary delegations of Korea and Tajikistan 
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the Tajik parliamentary delegation were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall yesterday.
 At the talks, both sides informed each other of the situation of their countries and exchanged views on the issue of developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parliaments and a series of issues of mutual concern.    
 Present at the talks on the DPRK side were Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Mun Sang Min and Pak Jong Sun, deputies to the SPA, and officials concerned and on the Tajik side were members of the Tajik parliamentary delegation led by Saidullo Khairulloev, speaker of the lower house of the parliament.
